name: microwave oven production | microwave oven | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21994/documentation

This activity represents the production and disposal of an average microwave oven which is approximately 10.6 kg in mass, has a rating of 1150 W and capacity of 17 liters. This microwave oven has the envisaged lifetime of 8 years and is manufactured in China. The figures on material inputs from technosphere and energy required to produce an average microwave oven are taken from Gallego-Schmid et al. 2018. The figure on the annual production volume (40000000 units) is from International Microwave Power Institute 2013.

This activity starts with the reception of materials at the factory.

The activity includes the processes of material and energy use in manufacturing an average microwave oven. The inventory additionally accounts for disposal of all materials. Packaging is not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/275:Manufacture of domestic appliances/2750:Manufacture of domestic appliances

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The literature sources used refer to the underpinning technology as being current.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Geography GLO was chosen because the dataset aims to represent the production of an average microwave oven. The literature sources used refer to manufacturing in China.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The literature sources used refer to manufacturing in China.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: For electricity, the figures have been presented in the literature in MJ. These have been subsequently converted into kWh by using the following formula 1 kWh = 3.6 MJ.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Manufacturing data are taken from Gallego-Schmid et al. 2018. Source: Gallego-Schmid, A., Mendoza, J.M.F., and Azapagic, A., 2018. Environmental assessment of microwaves and the effect of European energy efficiency and waste management legislation. Science of the Total Environment, 618, 487-499. Data on the annual production volume are taken from International Microwave Power Institute 2013. Source: International Microwave Power Institute, 2013. Microwave Ovens: an Overview: 2013. Available from: http://impi.org/microwave-ovens-an-overview-2013/ (Accessed 20 January 2018).

flow.name: microwave oven

exchanges.description: Estimated value.The input of infrastructure is approximated with the exchange 'metal working factory', this was chosen as metal is the main material constituting the final product. The general comment for the activity 'metal working faculty, GLO' [accessed 19.01.2018] specifies: '4.58E-10 units of this process are needed to produce 1 kg of final product. Additionally, the dataset for 'metal working factory' needs to be used together with the 'energy and auxilliary inputs, metal working factory', 1 kg of this exchange is required per 1 kg of final product.
